base_description: Rectangular white table with a classic design.
part_description: Four cylindrical legs, one rectangular tabletop, one central drawer with two round knobs.
internal_interaction_description: The tabletop is supported by four legs positioned at each corner. The drawer is centrally located beneath the tabletop, sliding in and out with the help of runners. The knobs allow for easy opening and closing of the drawer.
external_interaction_description: The table provides a flat surface for placing objects, serving as a workspace or dining area. The drawer offers storage for small items. It can be positioned in various settings, such as an office or dining room, interacting with chairs or other furniture.
